content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Our Front-end & JavaScript unit is part of a large \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Digital Engagement Practice.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The main goal of the Digital Engagement Practice is to create a positive user experience when interacting with apps, services, and products. The Practice combines design, front-end, PHP, mobile solutions, e-commerce platforms (ATG, Hybris), and digital marketing solutions (Sitecore, ADAM, and Adobe Experience Manager).\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Digital Engagement Practice is managed by:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":259691,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/5f6b95f6-33ce-4aad-b689-9a0bddd27acc/team.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/5f6b95f6-33ce-4aad-b689-9a0bddd27acc/team.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"team.PNG\",\"name\":\"team.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"5f6b95f6-33ce-4aad-b689-9a0bddd27acc\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":959,\"height\":329},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-link\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please join our \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://info.epam.com/topics/global/competencies-technologies/digital-engagement-practice-dep.html\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"DEP community\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" to get the latest news.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]}]}}"
